alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:08PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lemhi County through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southwest of Leadore, or 24 miles east of Challis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leadore and Patterson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
